title: HTML Reference API & Web Application

images.alt: HTML Reference Web Application index view

body: For personal development, I decided to get out of my front-end engineering comfort zone a little bit and build a REST API, for a theoretical HTML reference site. The API runs on Node and Express with a MongoDB database, and it has the standard CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations available. Thereâ€™s also a Mocha test suite, and API requests are cached for better performance.

I then made a simple companion web application for interfacing with the API, also with Node and Express. It has a central list for viewing all elements and form pages for adding, editing, and deleting elements, with error handling.
